channel.title: Script on Room362
channel.description: Recent content in Script on Room362

item.title: Rapid fire PSEXEC for Metasploit
item.description: Exploit modules inside of metasploit don’t have the ability to run on multiple hosts with one swing of the bat. So I created some code to facilitate that. It’s really not much but there are some really juicy pieces of knowledge I learned on the way here. // The following is a resource file, but instead of just giving you something to download or straight copy and paste, I’ve broken it up into sections.

item.title: Set Wallpaper Meterpreter Script
item.description: Certainly nothing to fuss over, but I’ve had a fascination with setting my target’s wallpaper as sort of a calling card for years now. I’ve been able to set the registry key (HKCUControl PanelDesktopWallpaper), but until recently I didn’t know how to get it to refresh so that it displayed without forcing the user to log out… First, is the most important part, selection of the wallpaper. This is my first selection:
